pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared DefaultDestination = let
  DefaultDestination = Lakehouse.Contents(null){[workspaceId = "b3b5a554-b416-4ea7-8161-6f084114bbf6"]}[Data]{[lakehouseId = "452f5f1e-80a3-4cdd-87cd-19b6787c5f3d"]}[Data]
in
  DefaultDestination;
shared Zone1_raw = let
  Source = SharePoint.Files("https://equfrjbr.sharepoint.com/sites/Teste_ingest", [ApiVersion = 15]),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each Text.Contains([Name], "Zone1")),
  #"Filtered hidden files" = Table.SelectRows(#"Filtered rows", each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true),
  #"Invoke custom function" = Table.AddColumn(#"Filtered hidden files", "Transform file", each #"Transform file"([Content])),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Invoke custom function", {{"Name", "Source.Name"}}),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Renamed columns", {"Source.Name", "Transform file"}),
  #"Expanded table column" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Removed other columns", "Transform file", Table.ColumnNames(#"Transform file"(#"Sample file"))),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Expanded table column", {{"Code1", Int64.Type}, {"SAP Internal Number1", Int64.Type}, {"Column1", type text}, {"Project1", type text}, {"SAP Source1", type text}, {"Currency1", type text}, {"Year1", Int64.Type}, {"Budget (LC)1", Int64.Type}, {"Actual (LC)1", Int64.Type}, {"Commitment (LC)1", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Changed column type", {"Source.Name", "Code1", "SAP Internal Number1", "Project1", "SAP Source1", "Currency1", "Year1", "Budget (LC)1", "Actual (LC)1", "Commitment (LC)1"}),
  #"Renamed columns 1" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Choose columns", {{"Source.Name", "Source_Name"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns 1";
shared #"Sample file" = let
  Source = SharePoint.Files("https://equfrjbr.sharepoint.com/sites/Teste_ingest", [ApiVersion = 15]),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each Text.Contains([Name], "Zone1")),
  #"Filtered hidden files" = Table.SelectRows(#"Filtered rows", each [Attributes]?[Hidden]? <> true),
  Navigation = #"Filtered hidden files"{0}[Content]
in
  Navigation;
shared Parameter = let
  Parameter = #"Sample file" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type binary, BinaryIdentifier = #"Sample file"]
in
  Parameter;
shared #"Transform Sample file" = let
  Source = Excel.Workbook(Parameter, null, true),
  Navigation = Source{[Item = "Page 1", Kind = "Sheet"]}[Data],
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Navigation, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  #"Promoted headers";
[FunctionQueryBinding = "{""exemplarFormulaName"":""Transform Sample file""}"]
shared #"Transform file" = let
  #"Transform file" = (Parameter as binary) => let
  Source = Excel.Workbook(Parameter, null, true),
  Navigation = Source{[Item = "Page 1", Kind = "Sheet"]}[Data],
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Navigation, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  #"Promoted headers"
in
  #"Transform file";
shared Zone1_raw_DataDestination = let
  Target = DefaultDestination,
  TableNavigation = Target{[ItemKind = "Table", Id = "Zone1_raw"]}?[Data]?,
  Table = NavigationTable.CreateTableOnDemand(TableNavigation, #table(type table[Source_Name = nullable Text.Type, Code1 = nullable Int64.Type, #"SAP Internal Number1" = nullable Int64.Type, Project1 = nullable Text.Type, #"SAP Source1" = nullable Text.Type, Currency1 = nullable Text.Type, Year1 = nullable Int64.Type, #"Budget _LC_1" = nullable Int64.Type, #"Actual _LC_1" = nullable Int64.Type, #"Commitment _LC_1" = nullable Int64.Type], {}), [DeleteWhenEmpty = true])
in
  Table;
[Staging = "FastCopyStaging"]
shared Zone1_raw_WriteToDataDestination = let
  Zone1_raw_WriteToDataDestination = Pipeline.ExecuteAction(ValueAction.WithTransaction([Target = Zone1_raw_DataDestination], (txn) => {TableAction.DeleteRows(txn[Target]), () => TableAction.InsertRows(txn[Target], Zone1_raw_TransformForWriteToDataDestination), Action.DoNothing}))
in
  Zone1_raw_WriteToDataDestination;
shared Zone1_raw_TransformForWriteToDataDestination = let
    ColumnMappings = {[SourceColumnName = "Source_Name", DestinationColumnName = "Source_Name"], [SourceColumnName = "Code1", DestinationColumnName = "Code1"], [SourceColumnName = "SAP Internal Number1", DestinationColumnName = "SAP Internal Number1"], [SourceColumnName = "Project1", DestinationColumnName = "Project1"], [SourceColumnName = "SAP Source1", DestinationColumnName = "SAP Source1"], [SourceColumnName = "Currency1", DestinationColumnName = "Currency1"], [SourceColumnName = "Year1", DestinationColumnName = "Year1"], [SourceColumnName = "Budget (LC)1", DestinationColumnName = "Budget _LC_1"], [SourceColumnName = "Actual (LC)1", DestinationColumnName = "Actual _LC_1"], [SourceColumnName = "Commitment (LC)1", DestinationColumnName = "Commitment _LC_1"]},
    SourceColumns = Table.SelectColumns(Zone1_raw, List.Transform(ColumnMappings, each _[SourceColumnName])),
    TargetColumns = Table.RenameColumns(SourceColumns, List.Transform(ColumnMappings, each {_[SourceColumnName], _[DestinationColumnName]}))
in
    TargetColumns;
shared DefaultStaging = let
  DefaultStaging = Pipeline.DefaultModelStorage()
in
  DefaultStaging;
shared FastCopyStaging = let
  FastCopyStaging = Pipeline.FastCopyModelStorage(DefaultStaging, [Required = false])
in
  FastCopyStaging;
